name: John Candy
comment: I’m glad you enjoyed my sweets

name: Richard Confectionery
comment: Millions of people from around the world are saying, “Mr Leespeak, we need you to do a Dubai chocolate review!!!” It’s quite a travesty honestly!! Back to what’s on hand, “sour dragon tongues” are quite a delectable treat! Glad you enjoyed!

name: It’s called Sour Dragon Tongue in English
comment: It’s called Sour Dragon Tongue in English

name: Liam
comment: Thank you for informing me, It's called Sour Dragon Tongue in English

name: Ryder Hamilton
comment: Awesome read as always, I'll be sure to give these a try if im ever in Iran (like that's ever gonna happen 😂) also the half star emoticon appears as a box on my phone, don't know if there's anything you can do about this but I figured id let you know
